Class GraphicsStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.export.GraphicsStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GraphicsStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Tracks the state of various Graphics properties.
